Class Driver

java.lang.Object
Driver
public class Driver
extends java.lang.Object
This driver reads all CSV files and converts them to LATEX files
Author:
Adir Ben-David and Jonathan Abitbol

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
      This driver reads all CSV files and converts them to LATEX files
      Parameters:

    • processFilesForValidation

      public static void processFilesForValidation​(java.io.File[] files, java.io.File[] latexFiles, java.util.Scanner[] scanners, java.io.PrintWriter[] pw)
      This method is to verify validation for the files.
      Parameters:
      files - This files is an array of type File which will hold all the files
      latexFiles - This is an array of type File which will hold all the converted latex files
      scanners - This is an array of type Scanner which will hold all the files that will be read
      pw - This is an array of type PrintWriter which will open all the created files
